column2: ['Level 10 right talent: 20% cooldown reduction reduced to 15%.', 'Level 15 left talent: +16%  Shrapnel movement speed slow reduced to +14%.', 'Reduced  Shrapnel movement slow from 15%/20%/25%/30% to 12%/18%/24%/30%.', "Reduced  Aghanim's Scepter upgraded  Assassinate stun duration from 1.8 to 1.5.", 'Talents:']

['Level 20 left talent changed: -1.5s  Assassinate cast time -> +30  Shrapnel damage per second.', 'Increased  Shrapnel damage per second from 15/35/55/75 to 20/40/60/80.', "Reworked  Aghanim's Scepter upgrade\nOld: Turns  Assassinate into a 400 radius ground target ability. Causes the projectiles to apply an instant attack with 280% critical damage and ensured  Headshot proc on enemies, instead of doing fixed magical damage. Targets heroes only.\nNew: Reduces  Assassinate cast time from 2 to 1, and increases stun duration from 0.01 to 1.8.", 'Old: Turns  Assassinate into a 400 radius ground target ability. Causes the projectiles to apply an instant attack with 280% critical damage and ensured  Headshot proc on enemies, instead of doing fixed magical damage. Targets heroes only.', 'New: Reduces  Assassinate cast time from 2 to 1, and increases stun duration from 0.01 to 1.8.', 'Talents:']

Replaces the fixed 320/485/650 magical damage with an attack of Sniper, with a 280% critical strike and a 100%  Headshot proc.", 'Added talents:']

Now starts giving vision after the effect delay, instead of instantly upon cast.', 'No longer ignores ancient creeps, Roshan and creep-heroes.', 'Increased charge respawn time from 40 to 55.', 'Increased effect delay from 0.8 to 1.4.', 'Now starts giving vision after the effect delay, instead of instantly upon cast.', ' Headshot can now miss.', 'Reduced  Assassinate damage from 355/505/655 to 320/485/650.']

['No longer deals damage to buildings.', 'Now has 3 charges with a 40 second replenish time, instead of a 15 second cooldown.', 'Slow and damage of multiple casts no longer stack.', 'Reduced mana cost from 120 to 50.', 'Increased duration from 9 to 10.', ' Shrapnel
No longer deals damage to buildings.
Now has 3 charges with a 40 second replenish time, instead of a 15 second cooldown.
Slow and damage of multiple casts no longer stack.
Reduced mana cost from 120 to 50.
Increased duration from 9 to 10.']
[' Headshot now slows movement speed by 100% and attack speed by 100 for 0.5 seconds, instead of stunning for 0.25 seconds.', 'Increased  Shrapnel radius from 400 to 450.']

['This affects his ability to auto attack units at his maximum range.', "Fixed Sniper's acquisition range not matching his maximum attack range (Increased from 800 to 950).\nThis affects his ability to auto attack units at his maximum range."]
